de.javasoft.swing.plaf.basic
Class BasicJYTableHeaderUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      javax.swing.plaf.TableHeaderUI
          javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTableHeaderUI
              de.javasoft.swing.plaf.JYTableHeaderUI
                  de.javasoft.swing.plaf.basic.BasicJYTableHeaderUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRolloverAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
SyntheticaJYTableHeaderUI
public class BasicJYTableHeaderUI
extends JYTableHeaderUI
implements IRolloverAware

Base UI-Delegate for JYTableHeader.

Features:

  • Uses TableHeaderMouseInputHandler for enhanced sort gesture support.
  • Install CellLayoutHint to support LAF dependent header cell layout.

See Also:
TableHeaderMouseInputHandler, CellLayoutHint

getYTableHeader

protected JYTableHeader getYTableHeader()
Convenience wrapper with type cast. Note that the unconditional cast is safe because it is checked (and non-ytableheaders rejected) at install time.

Returns:
the tableHeader casted to JYTableHeader

updateRolloverState

public void updateRolloverState(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Description copied from interface: IRolloverAware
Updates internal rollover state as appropriate for the MouseEvent.

Typically this method is called by MouseListeners.

Specified by:

Parameters:
